arts.ttl: Zapata’s Milestone Moment – Torino Striker Matches Dybala’s Serie A Record
arts.sum: Torino striker Duvan Zapata drew level with Paulo Dybala as the joint-best goalscorer in Serie A over the past ten years with Friday night's strike against Hellas Verona. The 33-year-old goal-getter was on the scoresheet as Paolo Vanoli's team grabbed a dramatic 3-2 victory at Stadio Marc'Antonio Bentegodi. The post Zapata’s Milestone Moment – Torino Striker Matches Dybala’s Serie A Record appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Torino in Verona for top spot
arts.sum: Torino are unbeaten in their first four matches in Serie A this season and in the era of three points for a win, only once have the Granata started a top-flight season with five games without defeat in the competition (2017/18, W3 D2). Torino are the team against which Hellas Verona have drawn the most Serie A games: 26 in 60 matches (10 wins for the Giallobl and 24 for the Granata).

arts.ttl: Serie A | Verona v Torino: Match Preview
arts.sum: Torino will look to maintain their strong start to the Serie A season when they visit Hellas Verona at the Stadio Bentegodi on Friday evening. The visitors currently sit fifth in the table with 8 points from their opening 4 matches, while Verona have had an up-and-down beginning with 2 wins and 2 losses. Hellas Verona have alternated between victories and defeats so far this campaign. They stunned Napoli 3-0 on opening day before losing to Juventus and then beating Genoa. Most recently, they fell 2-1 away to Lazio despite an equalizer from striker Casper Tengstedt.
